member.summary: The dialog box return value is Yes (usually sent from a button labeled Yes).

member.summary: The dialog box return value is No (usually sent from a button labeled No).

member.name: T:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom
member.summary: Represents a pseudo-random number generator, a device that produces a sequence of numbers that meet certain statistical requirements for randomness.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using a time-dependent default seed value.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified seed value.
member.param: A number used to calculate a starting value for the pseudo-random number sequence. If a negative number is specified, the absolute value of the number is used.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.Next
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero and less than System.Int32.MaxValue.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes zero but not maxValue.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within a specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a random number between 0.0 and 1.0.
member.returns: A floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextFloat
member.summary: Returns a random number between 0.0 and 1.0.
member.returns: A floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextBool
member.summary: Returns a single random bit.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextDoubleCenter
member.summary: Returns a random number between -0.5 and 0.5.
member.returns: A floating point number greater than or equal to -0.5, and less than 0.5.

member.name: M:Engine.Utils.EngineRandom.NextFloatCenter
member.summary: Returns a random number between -0.5 and 0.5.
member.returns: A floating point number greater than or equal to -0.5, and less than 0.5.
